scripts.train: node src/train.js && cd gists/model && git add . && git commit -m 'bump' && git push && cd ../..
scripts.testBrowser: browserify src/app.js | terser --compress --mangle > test/index.js && firefox test/index.html
scripts.testNode: run(){ node src/train.js && node test/node.js "$1"; }; run
scripts.deploy: browserify src/app.js | sed 's/debug = true/debug = false/' | terser --compress --mangle > ./gists/atlasapproxnlp/atlasapproxnlp.js && cd gists/atlasapproxnlp && git add . && git commit -m 'bump' && git push && cd ../..
